page.title: 04FISHBURN COKE WORKS
page.content:
The coke works at Fishburn just feature partly in the area of the survey. Often you can see clouds of black or grey smoke billowing from it. The smell is awful. Most of the land which has been used for dumping from the mine is now being cleared and the site is being developed into grassland and woodland.
Last year 1984 it seemed as though the coke works would be closed down with a loss of jobs in the area but the National Coal Board reconsidered this decision.
Not many of the inhabitants of Bishop Middleham work at the coke works.
